body_html:
@asimshankar Thanks. The PR has been updated and v2 switching has been removed. Now this PR does:

  1. Change axis from int64 to int32.
  2. Update docstring in array_ops.cc
  3. Hide both Unique and UniqueV2
  4. Create a thin python wrapper to point tf.unique to gen_array_ops._unique. (Will switch to v2 3 weeks after this PR is merged).

Please take a look and let me know if there are any issues.

body:
@asimshankar Thanks. The PR has been updated and v2 switching has been removed. Now this PR does:
1. Change axis from int64 to int32.
2. Update docstring in array_ops.cc
3. Hide both Unique and UniqueV2
4. Create a thin python wrapper to point `tf.unique` to `gen_array_ops._unique`. (Will switch to v2 3 weeks after this PR is merged).

Please take a look and let me know if there are any issues.
